bn_IN {
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "h:mm:ss a z",
            "h:mm:ss a z",
            "h:mm:ss a",
            "h:mm a",
            "EEEE d MMMM yyyy",
            "d MMMM yyyy",
            "dd-MM-yyyy",
            "d-M-yy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    LocaleString { "bn_IN" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "##,##,##0.###;-##,##,##0.###",
            "\u00A4##,##,##0.00;-\u00A4##,##,##0.00",
            "##,##,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "IND" }
}
